news.title: Trump upbeat on Gaza ceasefire talks as he hosts Netanyahu
news.summary: The two leaders' meeting came with no sign of a breakthrough yet in the latest round of Israel-Hamas negotiations in Qatar.

news.title: Texas floods death toll climbs to more than 100
news.summary: Search and rescue teams have been wading through mud-piled riverbanks for a fourth day as more flash floods threaten the region.

news.title: US delays higher tariffs but announces new rates for some nations
news.summary: Trump says the US will impose a raft of levies after pausing his Liberation Day tariffs.

news.title: Families demand answers as Southport inquiry opens
news.summary: The inquiry will examine the lead up to the attack and the wider issue of extremist violence.

news.title: The Papers:  'PM to press Macron' and 'mushroom murders' trial
news.summary: The French president's state visit to the UK leads the front pages along with the verdict in Australia's 'mushroom murder trial'

news.title: Young campers, teachers and football coach among Texas flood victims
news.summary: At least 95 lives were lost near the Guadalupe River after a deluge on Friday, authorities say.

news.title: First malaria treatment for babies approved for use
news.summary: Until now, there had only been a vaccine for older children which carried an overdose risk for the young.

news.title: Indonesian volcano spews massive ash cloud as it erupts again
news.summary: Following a series of eruptions three weeks ago, Mount Lewotobi Laki-laki has begun spewing hot ash and lava again.

news.title: Man killed after opening fire on Texas border patrol station
news.summary: A man with a rifle and tactical gear was shot and killed by police after he opened fire in Texas.
